Acolyte: Tradition. The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld. (Lawful)
Anthropologist: Discovery. I want to be the first person to discover a lost culture.
Charlatan: Independence. I am a free spirit—no one tells me what to do. (Chaotic)
Criminal: Honor. I don't steal from others in the trade. (Lawful)
Criminal (Spy): Honor. I don't steal from others in the trade. (Lawful)
Entertainer: Beauty. When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Good)
Entertainer (Gladiator): Beauty. When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Good)
Fisher: Camaraderie. Good people make even the longest voyage bearable. (Good)
Folk Hero: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. (Good)
Guild Artisan: Community. It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthen the bonds of community and the security of civilization. (Lawful)
Guild Artisan (Guild Merchant): Community. It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthen the bonds of community and the security of civilization. (Lawful)
Haunted One: I try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Good)
Hermit: Greater Good. My gifts are meant to be shared with all, not used for my own benefit. (Good)
Marine: Teamwork. Success depends on cooperation and communication. (Good)
Noble: Respect. Respect is due to me because of my position, but all people regardless of station deserve to be treated with dignity. (Good)
Noble (Knight): Respect. Respect is due to me because of my position, but all people regardless of station deserve to be treated with dignity. (Good)
Outlander: Change. Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it. (Chaotic)
Sage: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
Sailor: Respect. The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew. (Good)
Sailor (Pirate): Respect. The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew. (Good)
Shipwright: Crew. If everyone on deck pitches in, we'll never sink. (Good)
Smuggler: Wealth Heaps of coins in a secure vault is all I dream of.
Soldier: Greater Good. Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others. (Good)
Urchin: Respect. All people, rich or poor, deserve respect. (Good)

Acolyte: Charity. I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Good)
Anthropologist: Distance. One must not interfere with the affairs of another culture - even one in need of aid. (Lawful)
Charlatan: Fairness. I never target people who can't afford to lose a few coins. (Lawful)
Criminal: Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)
Criminal (Spy): Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)
Entertainer: Tradition. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten, for they teach us who we are. (Lawful)
Entertainer (Gladiator): Tradition. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten, for they teach us who we are. (Lawful)
Fisher: Luck. Our luck depends on respecting its rules—now throw this salt over your shoulder. (Lawful)
Folk Hero: Fairness. No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law. (Lawful)
Guild Artisan: Generosity. My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world. (Good)
Guild Artisan (Guild Merchant): Generosity. My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world. (Good)
Haunted One: I'll stop the spirits that haunt me or die trying.
Hermit: Logic. Emotions must not cloud our sense of what is right and true, or our logical thinking. (Lawful)
Marine: Code. The marines' code provides a solution for every problem, and following it is imperative. (Lawful)
Noble: Responsibility. It is my duty to respect the authority of those above me, just as those below me must respect mine. (Lawful)
Noble (Knight): Responsibility. It is my duty to respect the authority of those above me, just as those below me must respect mine. (Lawful)
Outlander: Greater Good. It is each person's responsibility to make the most happiness for the whole tribe. (Good)
Sage: Beauty. What is beautiful points us beyond itself toward what is true. (Good)
Sailor: Fairness. We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards. (Lawful)
Sailor (Pirate): Fairness. We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards. (Lawful)
Shipwright: Careful Lines. A ship must be balanced according to the laws of the universe. (Lawful)
Smuggler: Smuggler's Code I uphold the unwritten rules of the smugglers, who do not cheat one another or directly harm innocents. (Lawful)
Soldier: Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority. (Lawful)
Urchin: Community. We have to take care of each other, because no one else is going to do it. (Lawful)

Acolyte: Change. We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world. (Chaotic)
Anthropologist: Knowledge. By understanding other races and cultures, we learn to understand ourselves.
Charlatan: Charity. I distribute the money I acquire to the people who really need it. (Good)
Criminal: Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Good)
Criminal (Spy): Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Good)
Entertainer: Creativity. The world is in need of new ideas and bold action. (Chaotic)
Entertainer (Gladiator): Creativity. The world is in need of new ideas and bold action. (Chaotic)
Fisher: Daring. The richest bounty goes to those who risk everything. (Chaotic)
Folk Hero: Freedom. Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people. (Chaotic)
Guild Artisan: Freedom. Everyone should be free to pursue his or her own livelihood. (Chaotic)
Guild Artisan (Guild Merchant): Freedom. Everyone should be free to pursue his or her own livelihood. (Chaotic)
Haunted One: I kill monsters to make the world a safer place, and to exorcise my own demons. (Good)
Hermit: Free Thinking. Inquiry and curiosity are the pillars of progress. (Chaotic)
Marine: Embracing. Life is messy. Throwing yourself into the worst of it is necessary to get the job done. (Chaotic)
Noble: Independence. I must prove that I can handle myself without coddling from my family. (Chaotic)
Noble (Knight): Independence. I must prove that I can handle myself without coddling from my family. (Chaotic)
Outlander: Honor. If I dishonor myself, I dishonor my whole clan. (Lawful)
Sage: Logic. Emotions must not cloud our logical thinking. (Lawful)
Sailor: Freedom. The sea is freedom—the freedom to go anywhere and do anything. (Chaotic)
Sailor (Pirate): Freedom. The sea is freedom—the freedom to go anywhere and do anything. (Chaotic)
Shipwright: Invention. Make what you need out of whatever is at hand. (Chaotic)
Smuggler: All for a Coin I'll do nearly anything if it means I turn a profit.
Soldier: Independence. When people follow orders blindly, they embrace a kind of tyranny. (Chaotic)
Urchin: Change. The low are lifted up, and the high and mighty are brought down. Change is the nature of things. (Chaotic)

Acolyte: Power. I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith's religious hierarchy. (Lawful)
Anthropologist: Power. Common people crave strong leadership, and I do my utmost to provide it. (Lawful)
Charlatan: Creativity. I never run the same con twice. (Chaotic)
Criminal: Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy.
Criminal (Spy): Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy.
Entertainer: Greed. I'm only in it for the money and fame.
Entertainer (Gladiator): Greed. I'm only in it for the money and fame.
Fisher: Plunder. Take all that you can and leave nothing for the scavengers.
Folk Hero: Might. If I become strong, I can take what I want—what I deserve.
Guild Artisan: Greed. I'm only in it for the money.
Guild Artisan (Guild Merchant): Greed. I'm only in it for the money.
Haunted One: I have a dark calling that puts me above the law. (Chaotic)
Hermit: Power. Solitude and contemplation are paths toward mystical or magical power.
Marine: Might. The strong train so that they might rule those who are weak.
Noble: Power. If I can attain more power, no one will tell me what to do.
Noble (Knight): Power. If I can attain more power, no one will tell me what to do.
Outlander: Might. The strongest are meant to rule.
Sage: No Limits. Nothing should fetter the infinite possibility inherent in all existence. (Chaotic)
Sailor: Mastery. I'm a predator, and the other ships on the sea are my prey.
Sailor (Pirate): Mastery. I'm a predator, and the other ships on the sea are my prey.
Shipwright: Perfection. To measure a being and find it lacking is the greatest disappointment.
Smuggler: Peace and Prosperity I smuggle only to achieve a greater goal that benefits my community. (Good)
Soldier: Might. In life as in war, the stronger force wins.
Urchin: Retribution. The rich need to be shown what life and death are like in the gutters.

Acolyte: Faith. I trust that my deity will guide my actions. I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well. (Lawful)
Anthropologist: Protection. I must do everything possible to save a society facing extinction. (Good)
Charlatan: Friendship. Material goods come and go. Bonds of friendship last forever. (Good)
Criminal: People. I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care.
Criminal (Spy): People. I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care.
Entertainer: People. I like seeing the smiles on people's faces when I perform. That's all that matters.
Entertainer (Gladiator): People. I like seeing the smiles on people's faces when I perform. That's all that matters.
Fisher: Balance. Do not fish the same spot twice in a row; suppress your greed, and nature will reward you.
Folk Hero: Sincerity. There's no good in pretending to be something I'm not.
Guild Artisan: People. I'm committed to the people I care about, not to ideals.
Guild Artisan (Guild Merchant): People. I'm committed to the people I care about, not to ideals.
Haunted One: I like to know my enemy's capabilities and weaknesses before rushing into battle. (Lawful)
Hermit: Live and Let Live. Meddling in the affairs of others only causes trouble.
Marine: Bravery. To act when others quake in fear—this is the essence of the warrior.
Noble: Family. Blood runs thicker than water.
Noble (Knight): Family. Blood runs thicker than water.
Outlander: Nature. The natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization.
Sage: Power. Knowledge is the path to power and domination.
Sailor: People. I'm committed to my crewmates, not to ideals.
Sailor (Pirate): People. I'm committed to my crewmates, not to ideals.
Shipwright: Reflection. Muddied water always clears in time.
Smuggler: People For all my many lies, I place a high value on friendship.
Soldier: Live and Let Live. Ideals aren't worth killing over or going to war for.
Urchin: People. I help the people who help me—that's what keeps us alive.

Acolyte: Aspiration. I seek to prove myself worthy of my god's favor by matching my actions against his or her teachings.
Anthropologist: Indifferent. Life is cruel. What's the point in saving people if they're going to die anyway? (Chaotic)
Charlatan: Aspiration. I'm determined to make something of myself.
Criminal: Redemption. There's a spark of good in everyone. (Good)
Criminal (Spy): Redemption. There's a spark of good in everyone. (Good)
Entertainer: Honesty. Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are.
Entertainer (Gladiator): Honesty. Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are.
Fisher: Hard Work. No wave can move a soul hard at work.
Folk Hero: Destiny. Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling.
Guild Artisan: Aspiration. I work hard to be the best there is at my craft.
Guild Artisan (Guild Merchant): Aspiration. I work hard to be the best there is at my craft.
Haunted One: I'm a monster that destroys other monsters, and anything else that gets in my way.
Hermit: Self-Knowledge. If you know yourself, there's nothing left to know.
Marine: Perseverance. No injury or obstacle can turn me from my goal.
Noble: Noble Obligation. It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me. (Good)
Noble (Knight): Noble Obligation. It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me. (Good)
Outlander: Glory. I must earn glory in battle, for myself and my clan.
Sage: Self-Improvement. The goal of a life of study is the betterment of oneself.
Sailor: Aspiration. Someday, I'll own my own ship and chart my own destiny.
Sailor (Pirate): Aspiration. Someday, I'll own my own ship and chart my own destiny.
Shipwright: Hope. The horizon at sea holds the greatest promise.
Smuggler: Daring I am most happy when risking everything.
Soldier: Nation. My city, nation, or people are all that matter.
Urchin: Aspiration. I'm going to prove that I'm worthy of a better life.
